translation.en: Aah!
-[whirring] -Come on, guys, let's go!
-Yeah, whoo-hoo! -Yeah, dude!
♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Livin' inside computer parts ♪
-♪ The StoryBots ♪ -[yelling]
♪ Helping kids get super smart ♪
♪ They love to learn Love to learn ♪
-♪ And adore adventure ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
♪ And answering questions Is their business and pleasure ♪
translation.de: Und hast du mal Fragen, können sie die Antwort sagen

translation.en: ♪ There's a whole department Whose only task ♪
translation.de: Die Abteilung steht für dich bereit

translation.en: ♪ Is to answer anything we ask ♪
♪ So let's see if Team 341B Can solve another mystery ♪
translation.de: Also los jetzt, Team 341-B, Fangt an, das Rätsel zu lösen

translation.en: -♪ The StoryBots ♪ -[all whooping]
♪ Meet Beep and Bing Bang, Boop and Bo ♪
translation.de: Sind Beep und Bing, Bang, Boop und Bo

translation.en: ♪ Just ask them what you wanna know Just ask the StoryBots ♪
translation.de: Jede Frage klären sie sowieso Drum fragt die StoryBots

translation.en: ♪ And when they get a stumper That demands investigation ♪
translation.de: Wird es auch manchmal knifflig, unsre Bots sind echt gerissen

translation.en: ♪ It's to the outer world On a hunt for information ♪
translation.de: Gehen in die Außenwelt auf Jagd nach neuem Wissen

translation.en: ♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Got a question? Got lots? ♪
♪ If something's got you baffled Worry not ♪
translation.de: Stehst du vor einem Rätsel, frage hier

translation.en: ♪ Just ask the StoryBots ♪
♪ Just ask the StoryBots ♪
Beethoven! Flatbread! Nova Scotia!
Huh? Whoa! I need to shave.
Clean me up, Sam.
Nah.
Nope.
Perfect! See you next week.
Too many questions. Not enough time.
translation.de: Zu viele Fragen, nicht genug Zeit.

translation.en: Aah! Oh! Whoa!
Whoa, whoa, easy there.
-[beeping] -Holy Toledo!
Who am I gonna get to answer that?
Oh, Hap! Hold that pose.
You look amazing in this light.
translation.de: Du siehst toll aus in dem Licht.

translation.en: I-I do?
I mean, quit your dilly-dallying!
-We got work to-- -Hey, Hap! Hold this!
Oh, and this. Oh, and wear this!
translation.de: Und das! Und setz das auf!

translation.en: I don't have time for dress-up! We've got quest--
translation.de: Keine Zeit für Kostüme! Es gibt Fragen.

translation.en: Hey, Hap? Could you turn your head a little to the right?
translation.de: Hap, Kopf leicht nach rechts drehen.

translation.en: -Like this? -[Beep] Perfect!
Time's up, StoryBots!
[Beep] We're done, boss. Check it out!
[Hap] Ooh, not bad. Nice.
Holy cow, look at that!
All right, enough artin' around.
We've got a question to answer.
Hi, Storybots. My name is Mya.
-Hey, Mya, how're you doing? -Hi, there!
I have a question for you.
translation.de: Ich habe eine Frage an euch.

translation.en: How do you make music?
Hmm, that's a tough one.
How do you make music?
Well, do you know how to play any instruments, Mya?
I play the piano.
Wow, really? Can you play the banjo?
Yes.
Whoa, what about the drums?
Yes.
-A glockenspiel? -A sousaphone?
A B-flat triple piston, brass-plated flugelhorn?
N... Yes.
-Whoa! -Wow!
translation.de: Donnerwetter! Also was willst du von uns?

translation.en: So, what do you need us for?
translation.de: Also was willst du von uns?

translation.en: Bing, just because Mya can play music doesn't mean she knows how it's made.
translation.de: Mya spielt Musik, weiß aber vielleicht nicht, wie sie gemacht wird.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, you're right. -I didn't think about that.
translation.de: -Du hast Recht. -Das hab ich nicht überlegt.

translation.en: [gasps] Hey, wait, I got it! I know where we can find the answer!
translation.de: Warte, ich weiß, wo wir die Antwort finden.

translation.en: StoryBots, prepare for transport.
Let's find out how you make music.
translation.de: Finden wir heraus, wie man Musik macht.

translation.en: [all] Outer World, here we come!
Almost, mm... Ahh.
Perfect.
Painting.
[gasps] Oh, Bing, this was a great idea.
[Bing] Yeah, where better to learn about music than a music shop?
translation.de: Wir suchen die Antwort in einem Musikladen.

translation.en: All we have to do is play an instrument, and we'll have our answer.
translation.de: Wir spielen ein Instrument und haben unsere Antwort.

translation.en: Bing, I don't think it's that simple--
translation.de: Bing, so einfach ist das nicht.

translation.en: Oh, that did not sound like music, man.
translation.de: Das klang nicht nach Musik, Mann.

translation.en: Well, feast your ears on this.
Hmm. Music's gotta come out of one of these.
translation.de: Eines der Instrumente macht sicher Musik.

translation.en: Why won't these make music?
I don't know, man.
This seems, like, mega difficult. [strums]
That sounds like music!
Whoa, Bing, how'd you do that?
translation.de: Bing, wie hast du das geschafft?

translation.en: Just naturally talented, I guess.
Look! A music thingy!
[all] Whoa!
Come on, guys, let's follow it and see where it goes.
translation.de: Folgen wir ihm und sehen, wo es hinschwebt.

translation.en: -Yeah, come on, guys! -Let's do it!
Hey, look! It's going down the tuba.
translation.de: He, es verschwindet in der Tuba.

translation.en: All right!
[all] Whoa!
[all] Whoa!
[Bang] I don't think we're in the tuba anymore, dudes.
translation.de: Wir sind nicht mehr in der Tuba, Leute.

translation.en: Look! There's more of those music thingies.
Why are we just standing around? Come on, guys, follow me! Let's g--
translation.de: Nicht einfach rumstehen. Los, Leute, folgt mir. Auf...

translation.en: You'll never get into Music Land ringing the bells like that.
translation.de: Miserabel gespielt. So kommt ihr nie ins Land der Musik.

translation.en: [all] Music Land?
Is there an echo?
Could you tell us how to get into Music Land, Mr. Horn Thingy?
translation.de: Wie kommen wir denn ins Land der Musik, Mr. Horn?

translation.en: It's easy. Just ring the bells to climb the wall.
translation.de: Einfach. Spielt die Glocken und klettert die Wand hoch.

translation.en: You mean, like this?
No, no, no. You can't make just any noise.
translation.de: Nein, nein. Ihr macht nur Lärm.

translation.en: It needs to be a melody that
[in different pitches] gets you over the wall.
Melody, huh? What's melody?
Melody is a string of pitches you can sing along with.
translation.de: Melodie ist eine Sequenz von Tonlagen, bei der man mitsingen kann.

translation.en: Pitches? What are those?
[high-pitched] Pitch is how high a sound is.
translation.de: Das ist wie hoch der Ton ist.

translation.en: [low-pitched] Or how low a sound is.
So, if pitch is how high or low a sound is,
translation.de: Tonlage beschreibt, wie hoch oder tief eine Ton ist,

translation.en: and melody is a string of pitches,
then, to get over this high wall,
translation.de: Um über die Mauer zu gelangen,

translation.en: maybe we need to play a melody that gets higher in pitch.
translation.de: brauchen wir eine Melodie mit steigenden Tonlagen.

translation.en: Like this.
The melody is making more of those music thingies!
translation.de: Die Melodie erzeugt wieder solche Musikdinger!

translation.en: Those aren't "music thingies." They're music notes.
translation.de: Das sind keine "Musikdinger", das sind musikalische Noten.

translation.en: Well, whatever they are, they're making stairs.
Come on, guys, let's go!
-There we go. -Whoa.
Oh, hey, look! It's the castle!
That's right! Just follow the path to the King of Music.
translation.de: Jawohl, folgt dem Pfad zum König der Musik.

translation.en: [all] King of Music?
[gasps] I bet he can help us answer Mya's question.
translation.de: Der kann uns sicher mit Myas Frage helfen.

translation.en: Of course, he can. He's a living legend.
translation.de: Aber sicher. Er ist eine lebende Legende.

translation.en: But you better stay on the path.
You don't wanna get...
[low-pitched] lost.
-[laughing] -Thank you so much, Mr. Horn!
-Bye! -See ya!
Package from the Philharmonic Orchestra.
Instruments.
♪ From the great, big grand piano To the tiny tin kazoo ♪
translation.de: Vom großen Konzertflügel zum kleinen Blechkazoo

translation.en: ♪ There are tons and tons of instruments Let's try and name a few ♪
translation.de: Gibt es Unmengen von Instrumenten, und wir zählen ein paar auf

translation.en: ♪ There's the xylophone The slide trombone ♪
translation.de: Das ist das Xylofon, die Posaune

translation.en: ♪ The banjo with its snappy twang The bongo drums are fun to bang ♪
translation.de: Das Banjo mit dem scharfen Klang, die Bongos

translation.en: ♪ The violin, the theremin ♪
♪ The ukulele by the bay So many instruments to play ♪
translation.de: Die Ukulele und viele Instrumente mehr

translation.en: ♪ The clarinet, the little coronet ♪
♪ The tuba with its oompah sound The crashing cymbals, big and round ♪
translation.de: Die große Tuba, die lauten Becken

translation.en: ♪ The bagpipe too, the didgeridoo ♪
♪ The ocarina made of clay So many instruments to play ♪
translation.de: Die Okarina aus Ton, so viele Instrumente!

translation.en: ♪ Some people like to Strum the balalaika ♪
♪ Some like to play The ringing harpsichord ♪
♪ Harmonica, musical saw And the gigantic alpine horn ♪
translation.de: Harmonika, singende Säge und das riesige Alphorn

translation.en: ♪ The guitar, the harp, the piccolo The double bass, the diddley bow ♪
♪ The pan pipes and the timpani The French horn, the calliope ♪
♪ The glockenspiel, the bells, the gong ♪
♪ And many more not in this song ♪
♪ What a lot of sounds, hooray So many instruments to play ♪
translation.de: So viele tolle Klänge, so viele Instrumente zum Spielen

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait to meet the King of Music.
translation.de: Ich freu mich auf den König der Musik.

translation.en: Well, as long as we follow the path, we should be there in no ti--
translation.de: Solange wir dem Pfad folgen, sollten wir schnell da...

translation.en: [all] Whoa!
[Bang] That's a pretty big hole, man.
How will we ever make it across?
[two voices] We can show you how.
-It's easy. -Watch.
[all] Whoa!
Hey! Hey, come here! You're not getting away this time.
translation.de: He, zurück. Diesmal fliegst du nicht davon.

translation.en: Ha, this is fun!
Hey.
As you can see,
a single pitch all by itself can only take you so far.
translation.de: bringt euch eine einzelne Tonlage nur so weit.

translation.en: But in order to get that extra oomph,
you need to use some harmony.
Harmony? What's that?
Harmony's what you get when you combine two or more pitches.
translation.de: Zwei oder mehr Tonlagen bilden eine Harmonie.

translation.en: To create a sound that's pleasing.
[both] Like this.
-Whoa! -So cool!
That sounds beautiful.
Whoa, the music notes are, like, heading to the other side.
translation.de: He, die Musiknoten schweben zur anderen Seite.

translation.en: Grab on, guys!
-Huah! -Boop!
Thank you, Mr. and Mrs. Recorder! We appreciate the help!
translation.de: Danke, Mr. und Mrs. Blockflöte. Ihr habt uns sehr geholfen.

translation.en: Whoa, it's, like, super breezy up here, man.
translation.de: Es ist irgendwie total windig hier oben.

translation.en: I just wish we were a little closer to the ground.
translation.de: Wären wir doch nur etwas näher an der Oberfläche.

translation.en: Like a lot closer to the ground. [gulps]
It's OK, Bo, just look around.
translation.de: Es ist okay, Bo. Sieh dich nur um.

translation.en: It's so nice and peaceful.
Yeah, what could possibly go wrong?
-[loudly] Hello! -[all] Aah!
Oopsy daisy!
Whoa, that was, like, intense, man.
This place is giving me the creeps.
Well, at least we're on the ground, right?
translation.de: Naja, wir sind zumindest auf dem Boden.

translation.en: Yeah! Besides, everything should be fine, as long as we stay on the--
translation.de: Richtig. Und alles ist okay, solange wir auf dem...

translation.en: Uh, where's the path?
-[rustling] -Oh! What's that?
[rhythmically] Tap you feet to the beat. That's rhythm.
translation.de: Klopf den Beat mit dem Fuß. Das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: Tap our what?
[rhythmically] Add a pause, that's because it's rhythm.
translation.de: Mach eine Pause, denn auch das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: Do you happen to know how to get to the castle?
translation.de: Weiß du zufällig, wie wir zum Schloss kommen?

translation.en: [rhythmically] When you go fast or slow, that's tempo.
translation.de: Schlägt man schnell oder langsam, bestimmt man das Tempo.

translation.en: Follow me, and you'll see where to go.
translation.de: Folgt mir, ich zeige euch, wo es langgeht.

translation.en: Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.de: Kurz, kurz, lang. Kurz, kurz, lang. Das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: Uh, is this guy making sense to any of you?
translation.de: Versteht einer von euch, was der will?

translation.en: What is it, Boop?
[rhythmically] Boop, boop, boop. Boop, boop, boop.
Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.de: Kurz, kurz, lang. Kurz, kurz, lang. Das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: [all] Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.de: Kurz, kurz, lang. Kurz, kurz, lang. Das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.de: Kurz, kurz, lang. Kurz, kurz, lang. Das ist Rhythmus.

translation.en: Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhy--
translation.de: Kurz, kurz, lang. Kurz, kurz, lang. Das ist Rhyth...

translation.en: Guys! Look!
[gasps] It's the castle!
What are we waiting for? Let's go!
-Whoo-hoo! -Thank you! Thank you, Mr. Drum!
I can't believe we're finally gonna meet the King of Music.
translation.de: Hurra, wir lernen den König der Musik kennen.

translation.en: Yeah! I hope he's, like, all benevolent and stuff.
translation.de: Ich hoffe er ist total gütig.

translation.en: -[three voices] Halt! -Huh?
To see the King of Music, you must get past us first.
translation.de: Ihr könnt den König der Musik nur sehen, wenn wir euch einlassen.

translation.en: Only those familiar with the musical element "timbre" are allowed entry!
translation.de: Nur wer weiß, was "Klangfarbe" ist, wird durchgelassen.

translation.en: OK! Well, uh... What's timbre?
Timbre is the quality of sound.
Shh, Jerry, don't tell them!
Timbre is what makes one sound different from another.
Garry, quiet!
Kind of like how this...
Has a different timbre than this.
translation.de: hat eine andere Klangfarbe als das.

translation.en: No, you're giving everything away!
We're guards! We're supposed to guard the castle!
translation.de: Wir sind Wachen! Wir bewachen das Schloss!

translation.en: So, this... [claps]
...has a different timbre than this? [knocks]
translation.de: hat eine andere Klangfarbe als das?

translation.en: And this? [honks]
And ♪ this! ♪
Ah, now look what you two have done.
[sighs] Very well, just come on in.
-Thank you so, so much. Thanks, guys! -Thanks, gang!
Bye, Garry! Bye, Larry! Bye, Jerry! Bye-bye!
translation.de: Tschüss, Garry, Larry und Jerry! Wiedersehen!

translation.en: I don't mean to brag, but I think we are pretty great guards.
translation.de: Ich will ja nicht angeben, aber wir sind sehr gute Wachen.

translation.en: You know what they say. Three heads are better than one.
translation.de: Wie man sagt: Drei Köpfe sind besser als einer.

translation.en: Ugh. Nobody says that.
[man] And now, presenting...
Hercules! The world's strongest StoryBot.
translation.de: Und nun, verehrtes Publikum... Herkules. Der stärkste StoryBot der Welt.

translation.en: [grunts] One!
[grunts] Two!
[Hercules, weakly] Three.
Three.
♪ How many rings in a circus tent? And how many holes in a bowling ball? ♪
translation.de: Manegen im Zirkuszelt, Löcher in der Bowlingkugel,

translation.en: ♪ How many corners in a triangle? Everybody knows there are three in all ♪
translation.de: Ecken im Dreieck sind immer drei.

translation.en: ♪ Three little wheels go round and round When a tricycle goes zippin' by ♪
translation.de: Drei Räder drehen sich, wenn ein Dreirad vorbeifährt

translation.en: ♪ Three little pigs have a house of bricks ♪
translation.de: Drei Schweinchen in dem Haus aus Stein

translation.en: ♪ And three little kittens have their pie ♪
♪ Three-minute eggs are cookin' Three strikes you're out ♪
translation.de: 3-Minuten-Eier braten, Drei Fehler und du bist raus

translation.en: ♪ The number three is such a thrill It makes me wanna shout ♪
translation.de: Die Nummer 3 macht solchen Spaß, ich möchte schreien

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Hip-hip hooray ♪
translation.de: Hip, hip, hurra! Hip, hip, hurra! Hip, hip, hurra!

translation.en: ♪ Three cheers for three ♪
♪ Hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.de: Hip, hip, hurra! Die Drei lebe dreimal hoch

translation.en: ♪ Triceratops has three big horns Three musketeers yell "All for one!"♪
translation.de: Der Triceratops hat drei Hörner, Die Musketiere waren drei

translation.en: ♪ When your ice cream's got three flavors That's called Neapolitan ♪
translation.de: Eis mit drei Geschmacksrichtungen heißt Fürst-Pückler-Eis

translation.en: ♪ Goldilocks she met three bears Columbus had three ships at sea ♪
translation.de: Goldlöckchen traf drei Bären, Kolumbus hatte drei Schiffe

translation.en: ♪ A genie grants three magic wishes Old King Cole had fiddlers three ♪
translation.de: Ein Flaschengeist gewährt drei Wünsche, König Coel hatte drei Fiedler

translation.en: ♪ Three-colored traffic lights Mean stop or wait or go ♪
translation.de: Die Ampel hat drei Farben: Halt, Warten oder Fahren

translation.en: ♪ The number three just tickles me I gotta let it show ♪
translation.de: Ich find die Nummer 3 famos, und ich sag es jedem

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Hip-hip hooray ♪
translation.de: Hip, hip, hurra! Hip, hip, hurra! Hip, hip, hurra!

translation.en: ♪ Three cheers for three ♪
♪ Hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.de: Hip, hip, hurra! Die Drei lebe dreimal hoch

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.de: Hip, hip, hurra! Hip, hip, hurra! Die Drei lebe dreimal hoch

translation.en: Hello? Mr. King?
-Hello? -[Bing] Anybody home?
Only those who know the elements of music may seek counsel from the king!
translation.de: Nur wer die Elemente der Musik kennt, darf den König um Rat fragen!

translation.en: I don't think I know the elements of music.
translation.de: Ich glaube, ich kenne die Elemente nicht.

translation.en: I don't think I do either.
Guys, we learned them on the way here, remember?
translation.de: Leute, wir haben sie doch auf dem Weg gelernt.

translation.en: There was melody.
Oh, yeah, and harmony!
-And don't forget rhythm! -Oh, and timbre!
And what about... intensity?
translation.de: Und was ist mit der... Lautstärke?

translation.en: Uh, what about intensity?
You know.
[emphatically] Intensity!
Uh... It's not ringing a bell, dude.
Really, Mike? That was your one job.
translation.de: Echt, Mike? Das war dein Job.

translation.en: [loudly] Sorry, boss!
I guess if you want something done, you've got to do it yourself.
translation.de: Ich sag es ja, wenn man nicht alles selber macht.

translation.en: So, musically speaking, intensity is the volume of sound.
translation.de: Die Intensität der Klangereignisse heißt Lautstärke

translation.en: With it, things can be very soft.
translation.de: Ein Klang kann sehr leise sein.

translation.en: [loudly] Or very loud!
Now, what was that element?
[all] Intensity.
I can't hear you!
[all louder] Intensity!
A little bit louder!
[all louder] Intensity!
Oh, wait! That's too intense! Oh, no!
translation.de: Halt. Das ist zu laut. Oh nein!

translation.en: Darn that Gary and his discounted electronics.
translation.de: Dieser verflixte Garry mit seiner Billigelektronik.

translation.en: Well, it sure looks like you all know your elements of music.
translation.de: Ihr kennt euch aber bei den Elementen der Musik aus!

translation.en: I mean, look at what you've done here!
translation.de: Hier seht ihr, was ihr angerichtet habt.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
I guess we just got a little carried away.
translation.de: Es ist wohl mit uns durchgegangen.

translation.en: Ah, that's all right,
because I know the one secret to getting these elements back in shape.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wie wir die Elemente wieder in Ordnung bringen.

translation.en: What's that, Mr. King of Music?
translation.de: Und wie, Mr. König der Musik?

translation.en: Organization!
You see, without organization,
sounds are just noise.
But when melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre and intensity
translation.de: Aber wenn Melodie, Harmonie, Rhythmus, Klangfarbe und Intensität

translation.en: are organized in a way that makes people feel things...
translation.de: so organisiert werden, dass Zuhörer etwas fühlen...

translation.en: that's music.
-[all] Oh! -That's music!
In fact, music can make you feel all sorts of things.
translation.de: Musik kann alle möglichen Gefühle hervorrufen.

translation.en: It can make you feel happy.
[feigns crying] Or sad.
Or anything in between.
This one makes me feel groovy, man.
translation.de: Bei der Musik fühl ich mich groovy.

translation.en: This one makes me feel excited!
And this one makes me feel like dancing.
Precisely.
So you see, StoryBots, you don't need to be royalty to know how to make music.
translation.de: Ihr müsst nicht König sein, um Musik zu machen.

translation.en: All you need are the five elements and a little bit of organization!
translation.de: Ihr braucht die fünf Elemente und ein bisschen Organisation.

translation.en: Well, it looks like we got our answer, guys!
translation.de: Okay, hier ist unsere Antwort, Leute.

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -We did it!
-Oh, I love it! -Thank you, Mr. King!
[chanting] Thank you, King of Music!
[all] Thank you, King of Music! Whoo! Thank you, King of Music! Hey!
translation.de: Danke, König der Musik! Danke, König der Musik! Hey!

translation.en: [robotic voice] StoryBot fun fact number 107,476,092.
Did you know that a chicken's heart beats four times as fast as a human
translation.de: Hühnerherzen schlagen vier Mal schneller als menschliche

translation.en: and ten times faster than a turtle?
translation.de: und zehn Mal schneller als Schildkrötenherzen.

translation.en: Mm-hmm, mm-hmm, mm-hmm. Perfect.
-[monitor beeping slowly] -Uh-huh, uh-huh, huh. Perfect.
-[monitor beeping rapidly] -Oh, wait! Wait, wait! No, no, no!
Wait, wait! No! No, no, no, no! Wait! No!
translation.de: Halt, halt! Nein, nein! Halt! Nein!

translation.en: Ah. Perfect.
♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪
♪ Just bob your beak to the beat ♪
translation.de: Also wippt den Schnabel im Rhythmus

translation.en: ♪ Come on, bob your beak to the beat ♪
translation.de: Los, wippt den Schnabel im Rhythmus

translation.en: ♪ Let's all bob our beaks to the beat ♪
♪ What's up then I'm hanging in this chicken pen ♪
translation.de: Was geht? Ich hänge im Hühnerhaus

translation.en: ♪ I'm a female chicken So call me a hen ♪
translation.de: Ein weibliches Huhn, also ein Henne

translation.en: -♪ Don't call me a chick ♪ -♪ Nah ♪
♪ That's a little baby ♪
♪ A male is a rooster ♪
-Yo, call me, girl! -♪ Maybe ♪
♪ We all got wings Which make us look fly ♪
♪ But chickens can't fly As hard as we try ♪
♪ And what are these things on top of our domes ♪
translation.de: Und oben auf dem Kopf haben wir einen Kamm

translation.en: -♪ They help us stay cool ♪ -♪ And we call 'em combs ♪
♪ Our hearts beat four times faster than yours ♪
translation.de: Das Herz schlägt schneller als eures

translation.en: ♪ When we walk We bob our heads back and forth ♪
translation.de: Beim Laufen wackeln wir mit dem Kopf

translation.en: ♪ When we talk We cluck ♪
♪ We cluckin' at you ♪
-♪ And the roosters in the morning go ♪ -♪ Cock-a-doo-dle-do ♪
♪ But the best thing about us? Look under my legs ♪
♪ Us female chickens, we can lay eggs ♪
♪ Eggs that you eat Others for hatching ♪
translation.de: Eier zum Essen, Eier zum Ausbrüten

translation.en: ♪ I'm a tiny new chick What's up, man, what's crackin' ♪
translation.de: Ich bin ein kleines Küken, was geht, Mann?

translation.en: ♪ Eggs can be white or brown or blue ♪
translation.de: Eier sind weiß, braun oder blau

translation.en: ♪ I lay one egg a day, this is a cow ♪
translation.de: Ich lege ein Ei pro Tag.

translation.en: ♪ We eat bugs, seeds, veggies And wheat ♪
translation.de: Wir fressen Insekten, Körner und Gemüse

translation.en: ♪ Now bob your beak To the freaky fresh beat ♪
translation.de: Wippt jetzt den Schnabel im Rhythmus

translation.en: -♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Come on ♪
translation.de: Bob, dein Schnabel ist der beste

translation.en: -♪ Just bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Everybody now ♪
-♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Buk-buk-buk ♪
♪ Bob your beaks to the beat ♪
Hush puppies! Couch potato! Packing peanuts!
-[whirring] -What the--
What are you StoryBots doing back here?
I told you to get an answer! Not dilly-dally!
translation.de: Ihr sollt die Antwort finden, nicht rumtrödeln.

translation.en: We got the answer, boss. We know how you make music.
translation.de: Wir haben die Antwort, Boss. Wie wissen, wie man Musik macht.

translation.en: The first thing you need to know is that all music is made up of sounds.
translation.de: Zuerst einmal besteht alle Musik aus Klängen.

translation.en: Yeah, but not all sounds are music. Some are just plain noise.
translation.de: Aber nicht alle Klänge sind Musik, sondern oft nur Lärm.

translation.en: For sounds to be music,
they need to be organized in a way that makes people feel something.
translation.de: muss man sie so organisieren, dass Leute etwas fühlen,

translation.en: Like happy, sad, nervous, scared.
translation.de: glücklich sind, oder traurig, nervös, ängstlich.

translation.en: Or maybe just makes you wanna tap your toes, man.
translation.de: Oder du willst einfach nur mit dem Fuß wippen.

translation.en: There are five ways people organize sounds to make music.
translation.de: Klänge können nach fünf Methoden organisiert werden.

translation.en: Melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre, and intensity.
translation.de: Melodie, Harmonie, Rhythmus, Klangfarbe und Lautstärke.

translation.en: Melody is a string of pitches you can sing along with.
translation.de: Melodien sind Tonlagensequenzen und man kann mitsingen.

translation.en: And pitch is how high or low a sound is.
translation.de: Tonlagen sind die Höhe eines Klangs.

translation.en: Harmony is when multiple pitches are played at the same time.
translation.de: Bei Harmonien werden mehrere Tonlagen gleichzeitig gespielt.

translation.en: And rhythm is the way sounds repeat over time.
translation.de: Rhythmus beschreibt die Wiederholung der Tonlagen.

translation.en: Timbre is what makes one thing sound different from another.
And intensity is how loud or soft the sounds are played.
translation.de: Und Lautstärke definiert, wie laut oder leise ein Klang gespielt wird.

translation.en: So, when melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre, and intensity
translation.de: Wenn Melodie, Harmonie, Rhythmus, Klangfarbe und Lautstärke

translation.en: are organized in a way that make people feel something...
translation.de: so organisiert sind, dass Zuhörer etwas fühlen...

translation.en: [all] That's how you make music.
Just-- Just give me that tape.
♪ Melody, harmony, rhythm Timbre, intensity ♪
♪ That's how sound is arranged to be ♪
translation.de: So wird Klang arrangiert, damit er

translation.en: ♪ Music to our ears ♪
♪ Let's start with pitch ♪
♪ An important part of music ♪
♪ It can be high or low ♪
translation.de: Sie kann hoch oder tief sein

translation.en: ♪ Let me show you how to use it ♪
♪ You make melody ♪
♪ A string of pitches One after the other ♪
♪ And harmony a group of pitches Playing altogether ♪
♪ And then you got rhythm ♪
♪ Rhythm ♪
♪ The way a sound repeats ♪
♪ It might make you tap your toes ♪
♪ It might make you tap, tap Tap, tap, toe ♪
♪ And timbre, what makes one sound Different from another ♪
♪ I'll show you how that goes ♪
♪ And at last, intensity How loud or soft a sound is played ♪
translation.de: Und dann Lautstärke, wie laut oder leise der Klang ist

translation.en: ♪ Now you know How sound is organized into music ♪
translation.de: So wird Klang zu Musik organisiert

translation.en: ♪ Made of melody, harmony Rhythm, timbre, intensity ♪
translation.de: Aus Melodie, Harmonie, Rhythmus, Klangfarbe und Lautstärke

translation.en: ♪ Gets our feelings flowing Our hummers humming ♪
♪ Our fingers drumming, everybody ♪
♪ Melody, harmony Rhythm, timbre, intensity ♪
translation.de: Melodie, Harmonie, Rhythmus, Klangfarbe und Lautstärke

translation.en: ♪ That's how sound is arranged to be Music to our ears ♪
translation.de: So wird Klang arrangiert, damit er Musik in unseren Ohren ist

translation.en: Oh, that was actually kind of groovy.
-Hey! Way to go, guys! -Wee! We got an answer!
Hey, guys, look! It's Mya!
-Hi, Mya! -Hey! Hey, Mya! Hi!
So, Mya, what do you think?
Wow, StoryBots! Music is the coolest!
Yeah, it sure is.
Let's have a dance party!
[all] Dance party!
Great idea! Hit it, Boop!
[techno music playing] ♪ Let's have a dance party ♪
♪ Dance party, dance party ♪
♪ Let's have a dance party ♪
That's enough moving and shaking, StoryBots!
These questions won't answer themselves!
Stop bopin' around! Get back to work!
translation.de: Kein Rumhüpfen mehr. Los an die Arbeit!

translation.en: -[Hap] Go! Go! Move! Move! Move! Now! -Bye, boss.
♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Livin' inside computer parts ♪
♪ The StoryBots ♪
♪ Helping kids get super smart ♪
♪ They love to learn Love to learn ♪
♪ And adore adventure ♪
♪ And answering questions Is their business and pleasure ♪
translation.de: Und hast du mal Fragen, können sie die Antwort sagen

translation.en: ♪ There's a whole department Whose only task ♪
translation.de: Die Abteilung steht für dich bereit

translation.en: ♪ Is to answer anything we ask ♪
♪ So let's see if Team 341B Can solve another mystery ♪
translation.de: Also los jetzt, Team 341-B, Fangt an, das Rätsel zu lösen

translation.en: ♪ The StoryBots ♪
♪ Meet Beep and Bing Bang, Boop, and Bo ♪
translation.de: Sind Beep und Bing, Bang, Boop und Bo

translation.en: ♪ Just ask them what you wanna know Just ask the StoryBots ♪
translation.de: Jede Frage klären sie sowieso Drum fragt die StoryBots
